name: Might and Magic: Book One - Secret of the Inner Sanctum
name_original: Might and Magic: Book One - Secret of the Inner Sanctum
description:
Might and Magic: Book One - Secret of the Inner Sanctum is a RPG game developed by New World Computing. It was originally released in 1986. It was published by StarCraft. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Might and Magic: Book One - Secret of the Inner Sanctum on Commodore / Amiga, Apple II, NES and PC.
It was scored by Masaharu Iwata.
